Class ServerConfiguration

java.lang.Object

public class ServerConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Details

    • ServerConfiguration

      public ServerConfiguration​(java.lang.String url, int port, java.lang.String adminEmail, LogLevel logLevel, java.lang.String locale)
      Create a server configuration object.
      Parameters:
      url - The server URL
      port - The server port
      adminEmail - The e-mail address of the server administrator
      logLevel - The minimum log level
      locale - Language into which the server converts log messages and console outputs. "de-DE" or "en-US"
